channel.title: Neutral offensive class: Condottiere
channel.description: Goal: gain 5 bridles Day ability: offer contract (Infinite uses): cannot be used on same target more then once. Target will receive pop-up asking who they want dead. whoever they select will be marked. Day ability: cloak and dagger (2 uses): slice a marked player of your choice, making them bleed. if they die from the bleeding, gain a bridle. Night ability: Stab (inf uses): attack a marked player. if successfully kill them, gain a bridle. Night ability: Better gear (costs 1 bridle): gain death immunity for the rest of the game.

item.title: Neutral offensive class: Condottiere
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Goal: gain 5 bridles
Day ability: offer contract (Infinite uses): cannot be used on same target more then once. Target will receive pop-up asking who they want dead. whoever they select will be marked.
Day ability: cloak and dagger (2 uses): slice a marked player of your choice, making them bleed. if they die from the bleeding, gain a bridle.
Night ability: Stab (inf uses): attack a marked player. if successfully kill them, gain a bridle.
Night ability: Better gear (costs 1 bridle): gain death immunity for the rest of the game.
